name: Earth
description: Mankind's ancestral home, Earth was decimated in 2123 when a terrorist group comandeered 5 FTL spacecraft and crashed them at light-speed directly into major metropolitan areas.  Now 'contaminated' by radiation, it has gone back to the state it had before Mankind- a planet-sized nature reserve. Those who could afford it migrated to Mars or Titan, those who couldn't died or moved to the Habitat in Earth orbit.
